description: From the brand Previous page Highly effective medical-grade products created by pharmacists, prescribed by doctors. SVR products contain natural origin actives that support the skin barrier + microbiome. Designed to be gentle on sensitive skin. EXPLORE OUR BRAND >>> FRENCH PHARMACY The original French Pharmacy brand since 1962. Dermatological brand sold in over 60 countries. ALL SKIN-TYPES Skin-safe formulas for all skin types. Newborn, baby, child, sensitive + reactive. MEDICAL-GRADE FORMULATIONS Well-tolerated medical-grade formulations, prescribed by doctors globally. CLEAN FORMULAS Highly efficacious concentrated actives - maximum of natural ingredients, no nasties. ENVIRONMENTALLY AWARE Formulas with minimal environmental impact. Committed to reduced packaging + plastic. PERSONALISED MIX + MATCH Pick your ideal hydration intensity, treatment, SPF by skin type, preferred cleansing method. MIX + MATCH YOUR OWN ROUTINE Visit the store Next page

product_details_tab_data.Title: SVR CICAVIT+ SOS Ultra-Rapid Anti-Itch Relief Face and Body Spray, for Soothing and Cooling Itchy and Damaged Skin, Alll Ages, 40ml
product_details_tab_data.Buy Box Seller: Laboratoires SVR & Lazartigue (92% positive over last 12 months)
product_details_tab_data.Lowest FBA Seller: Laboratoires SVR & Lazartigue (92% positive over last 12 months)
product_details_tab_data.Categories - Tree: Beauty › Skin Care › Body › Moisturisers › Creams
product_details_tab_data.Specific Uses: Spray skin from min.15cm, as required. No need to massage in. For the face, apply via the hands to avoid the eyes
product_details_tab_data.Product Benefit: Concentrated soothing actives, centella asiatica + provitamin B5 ease discomfort, promote healing + reduce scarring
product_details_tab_data.Ingredients: Aqua (purified water), dimethyl ether, niacinamide, centella asiatica extract, chondrus crispus (carrageenan) extract, levulinic acid, oleyl alcohol, panthenol, pantolactone, pueraria lobata root extract, zanthoxylum bungeanum fruit extract, alpha-glucan oligosaccharide, glucose, glycerin, rhamnose, tocopherol, butylene glycol, caprylyl glycol, cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, disodium edta, ethylhexylglycerin, glucuronic acid, gossypium herbaceum (cotton) seed oil , hydrogenated palm glycerides citrate, hydroxyethyl acrylate/sodium acryloyldimethyl taurate copolymer, isohexadecane, pentylene glycol, polysorbate 60, propanediol, sodium hydroxide, sodium levulinate, sorbitan isostearate, xanthan gum, sodium
